verses.verse: <WG2919> But I Judged <WG1161> With Myself <WG1683> This, <WG5124> <WG3588> Not <WG3361> Again <WG3825> To Come <WG2064> In <WG1722> Grief <WG3077> To <WG4314> You. <WG5209>

And <WG2532> I Wrote <WG1125> To You <WG5213> This <WG5124> Same, <WG846> <WG2443> Lest <WG3361> Having Come <WG2064> Grief <WG3077> I Might Have <WG2192> ' From Those <WG575> Of Whom <WG3739> It Behoves <WG1163> Me <WG3165> To Rejoice; <WG5463> Trusting <WG3982> In <WG1909> All <WG3956> You, <WG5209> That <WG3754> <WG3588> <WG1699> My Joy That <WG5479> Of All <WG3956> You <WG5216> Is. <WG2076>

<WG1537> For Out Of <WG1063> Much <WG4183> Tribulation <WG2347> And <WG2532> Distress <WG4928> Of Heart <WG2588> I Wrote <WG1125> To You <WG5213> Through <WG1223> Many <WG4183> Tears; <WG1144> Not <WG3756> That <WG2443> Ye Might Be Grieved, <WG3076> But <WG235> The <WG3588> Love <WG26> That <WG2443> Ye Might Know <WG1097> Which <WG3739> I Have <WG2192> More Abundantly <WG4056> Towards <WG1519> You. <WG5209>

<WG1487> But If <WG1161> Anyone <WG5100> Has Grieved, <WG3076> Not <WG3756> Me <WG1691> He Has Grieved, <WG3076> ' But <WG235> <WG575> In Part <WG3313> That <WG2443> <WG3361> I May Not Overcharge <WG1912> All <WG3956> You. <WG5209>
Sufficient <WG2425> <WG3588> To Such A One Is <WG5108> <WG3588> <WG2009> This Rebuke <WG3778> Which Is <WG3588> By <WG5259> The <WG3588> Greater Part; <WG4119>

<WG1519> <WG5124> For, For This <WG1063> Also <WG2532> Did I Write, <WG1125> That <WG2443> I Might Know <WG1097> The <WG3588> Proof <WG1382> Of You, <WG5216> If <WG1487> To <WG1519> Everything <WG3956> Obedient <WG5255> Ye Are. <WG2075>

That <WG2443> <WG3361> We Should Not Be Overreached <WG4122> By <WG5259> <WG3588> Satan, <WG4567> <WG3756> For Not <WG1063> Of His <WG846> <WG3588> Thoughts <WG3540> Are We Ignorant. <WG50>

<WG2064> Now Having Come <WG1161> To <WG1519> <WG3588> Troas <WG5174> For <WG1519> The <WG3588> Glad Tidings <WG2098> Of The <WG3588> Christ, <WG5547> Also <WG2532> A Door <WG2374> To Me <WG3427> Having Been Opened <WG455> In The <WG1722> Lord, <WG2962>

<WG3588> <WG1161> But To God Be <WG2316> Thanks, <WG5485> Who <WG3588> Always <WG3842> Leads In Triumph <WG2358> Us <WG2248> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Christ, <WG5547> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Odour <WG3744> Of The <WG3588> Knowledge <WG1108> Of Him <WG846> Makes Manifest <WG5319> ' Through <WG1223> Us <WG2257> In <WG1722> Every <WG3956> Place. <WG5117>

For <WG3754> Of Christ <WG5547> A Sweet Perfume <WG2175> We Are <WG2070> <WG3588> To God <WG2316> In <WG1722> Those <WG3588> Being Saved <WG4982> And <WG2532> In <WG1722> Those <WG3588> Perishing; <WG622>
